tool_description: Creates organizational frameworks and outlines for different types of speeches based on duration and key messages.

speech_type.description: Type of speech: informative, persuasive, ceremonial, motivational, educational

main_points.description: Key messages or points to cover in the speech

structural_preference.description: Preferred organizational pattern: chronological, topical, problem-solution, cause-effect, comparative

audience_interaction.description: Whether to include audience interaction elements

error_messages: Invalid speech type: Must be one of [informative, persuasive, ceremonial, motivational, educational]
Invalid duration: Target duration must be between 1 and 180 minutes
Too many main points: Limit main points to 7 or fewer for effective delivery
Invalid structural preference: Must be one of [chronological, topical, problem-solution, cause-effect, comparative]
Duration-content mismatch: Too many main points for the specified duration
usage: Specify speech type, target duration in minutes, and main points array. Optionally set structural preference and audience interaction flag for customized organization.

outline_structure.description: Hierarchical outline of speech sections and subsections

time_allocation.description: Recommended time distribution for each section

structure_rationale.description: Explanation of why this structure works for the speech type and content
